mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.iparent) FROM t_parent AS A JOIN t_parent_kid AS B ON A.iparent = B.iparent JOIN t_kid AS C ON B.ikid = C.ikid where A.pr_is_del = #{prIsDel} and C.iclass = #{iclass}
SELECT B.kid_nm AS kidNm, B.iclass FROM t_parent_kid AS A JOIN t_kid AS B ON A.ikid = B.ikid where A.iparent = #{iparent}

SELECT ilevel, iclass, teacher_nm AS teacherNm, teacher_uid AS teacherUid, teacher_upw AS teacherUpw, teacher_introduce AS teacherIntroduce, teacher_profile AS teacherProfile, tc_is_del AS tcIsDel, tc_email AS tcEmail FROM t_teacher WHERE iteacher = #{iteacher}
